node.name: 24 HOURS URINE ALBUMIN/MICROALBUMIN
node.undefined6: 24 hours urine microalbumin,24 hr urine microalbuminuria, U24MA, u24ma,24 HOURS URINE ALBUMIN/MICROALBUMIN
node.undefined8: Presence of albumin in urine >300mg/24 hrs is termed as Macro-albuminuria and presence of albumin in urine 30 ? 300 mg/24 hrs is termed as Micro-albuminuria. Used as a marker for early kidney disease in diabetes and hypertension cardiovascular mortality and pre-eclampsia. Albumin in urine may be seen transiently in pregnancy, post -exercise, excessive protein intake, hyperglycemia, fever and urinary infections.
